q_en: Please release 100 units of cotton fabric from the Main warehouse.
gt:
Sure thing! Let's get those 100 units of Cotton Fabric released from the Main Warehouse. Here's a quick summary of the details:

| Material Name   | Warehouse Name | Quantity to Release |
|-----------------|----------------|---------------------|
| Cotton Fabric   | Main Warehouse | 100 units           |

Everything is set to go! If you need anything else, just let me know. ðŸ˜Š

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM materials WHERE name = 'Cotton Fabric';
steps.description: Retrieve the material ID for the material with the name "Cotton Fabric"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM warehouse WHERE name = 'Main Warehouse';
steps.description: Retrieve the warehouse ID for the warehouse with the name "Main Warehouse"

steps.sql: SELECT id, left_number FROM warehouse_material WHERE material_id = '1' AND warehouse_id = '1';
steps.description: Retrieve the warehouse_material ID and the left number for the specific material and warehouse

response:
Sure! Let's take a look at the details for releasing 100 units of Cotton Fabric from the Main Warehouse. Here's what we found:

| Material Name   | Warehouse Name | Available Units | Units to Release | Remaining Units |
|-----------------|----------------|-----------------|------------------|-----------------|
| Cotton Fabric   | Main Warehouse | 3500            | 100              | 3400            |

Great news! We have enough Cotton Fabric in the Main Warehouse to fulfill your request. ðŸŽ‰ After releasing 100 units, there will still be 3400 units left. If you need anything else, just let me know! ðŸ˜Š
